statement.tex: %text Write the distance of the following plane from the origin: $2x-y+2z+1=0$ %

step.context: %text The following is the distance of the plane $2x-y+2z+1=0$ from a point $(x_1, y_1)$. %
step.reason: %text The distance of any point $(x_1, y_1)$, from a plane $Ax+By+Cz+D=0$, is given by, % D=\left\vert\dfrac{Ax_1+By_1+Cz_1+D} {\sqrt{A^2+B^2+C^2}}\right\vert
